name: C.A.L.O.R.I.E.S. 9000
description:
Cats Always Lunch Over Risky Immeasurable Enormous Sandwiches

An old chief organizes a contest to find out who will be the new boss of cat's burger restaurant. To win, you'll have to cook a burger over 9000 kcal! 

Claw your opponent, mess with his work and build the fattest burger ever with anything around your paw. 

BEST PLAYED WITH 2 CONTROLLERS !
2 players can also play with 1 qwerty keyboard.

Game made in 48h for the ENJAM

Game Design: Clément Pilate • Théo Verpillat

Programming: Rémi Cros  (itch.io - LinkedIn) • Thomas Giro • Sébastien Violier

Graphic Design: You-Jeen Mette • Jeanne Prigent (twitter - tumblr)

Sound Design: Thomas Chastagnol

Project Manager: Coralie Feniello (itch.io - LinkedIn)

UI/UX: Amaury Hauler

Music: Jeremy Guarober
